title: SELECTION OF WIRING ENCLOSURES (NEW ZEALAND ONLY)
fullText:
All conduit systems shall conform with the requirements of IEC 61386-1 or AS 61386.1. Trunking systems shall be selected in accordance with AS/NZS 3000.
All conduit exposed to sunlight shall be of a UV resistant type conforming to the requirements of IEC 61386-1 or AS 61386.1.
